title: Civil Ceremony or Civil Partnership Venue Hire for £264 at Historic Tutbury Castle (Up to£660 Value)
highlights:
• Historic Royal castle ruins and grounds
  • Great Hall venue with long Tudor history
  • Time provided for photographs
  • Up to 45 guests
  • Food and drink available for surcharge

title: Manicure, Pedicure, Bio Sculpture Gel Overlays and Nail Art With Blow Dry and Conditioning Treatment for £29 at HD Hair (£80 Value)
highlights:
• Central Hucknall location
  • Gel overlays for fingers and toes
  • Choice of colours and nail art for Bio Gel overlays
  • Two and a half hour experience

title: £10 Ticket to Secret Party Project’s First BirthdayPool Party on 9 July 2011 (£25 Value)
highlights:
• Coaches available to secret location from several cities
  • Live acts including Weekend Millionaires and Peyton
  • Fire performers and stilt walkers
  • Glamorous hosts and hostesses
  • Changing and drying facilities and beauty salon

title: Six Car Washes for £12 at 5 Minute Car Wash (£31.50 Value)
highlights:
• Includes all cars, 4x4s, MPVs and taxis
  • Ten minutes from city centre
  • Takes up to five minutes
  • Wheels cleaned if not heavily soiled
  • No surcharge for extremely dirty cars

title: Romantic One Night Stay For Two With Champagne, Canapes and 25% Off Dinner for £79 at Woodborough Hall (Up to £201.90 Value)
highlights:
• Grand and luxurious property in rural Nottinghamshire
  • Nearby attractions include Sherwood Forest, The Peak District National Park and Nottingham Racecourse
  • Full English breakfast
  • 25% off dinner from the kitchen of former Buckingham Palace chef
  • Wi-Fi and flat screen TV in room
  • Wake-up service and newspaper

title: Whisky Connoisseur TastingMasterclass With Entertainment For One (£24) or Two (£43) at Malt Cross (Up to 77% Off)
highlights:
• Sessions last up to 90 minutes
  • Six different Scotch whiskies
  • Class covers introduction, history, production, understanding and flavour appreciation
  • Nibbles are included
  • Suitable for novices and devotees
  • 20% off food and drink purchased on the day
